pages.title: Ritual Table
pages.text: The block is obtained after using a $(l:hexalia:items/hex_focus)Hex Focus$() in a Cobbled Deepslate or Deepslate block.

pages.title: Natural Energy
pages.text: Each ritual consumes fully grown crops planted near the Ritual Table within the designated four 2Ã—2 farmland areas around it.$(br2)For rituals to be performed, the crops must be at their maximum growth stage.

pages.title: Salted Braziers
pages.text: Aside from crops, a total of four $(l:hexalia:rituals/ritual_braziers)Ritual Braziers$() should be placed on each side of the Ritual Table, and Salt should be placed in each of these braziers.$(br2)The Salt is placed by right-clicking the Ritual Brazier with the Salt item.

pages.title: Ritual Activation
pages.text: Once all the required catalyst and ingredients are placed, right-clicking the Ritual Table with a $(#6f4fab)Hex Focus$() starts the ritual process.
